IAP Workshop for SEEM & MKEM Programme
======================================

by [cmedpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/cmedpic/ "Posts by cmedpic")
 | Sep 23, 2020 | [CMED](https://fke.utm.my/category/cmed/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image_2020-10-15_092807.png)

Industry Advisory Panel (IAP) is one of the important stakeholders important in the development of the Bachelor of Electrical Engineering-Mechatronics (SEEM) and Master of Electrical Engineering-Mechatronics and Automatic Control (MKEM) curriculum. The faculty management periodically invites IAP to provide feedback on the relevancy of the current curriculum to the market needs.

This time the workshop is conducted at Sunway Putra Hotel, Kuala Lumpur on 24th of September 2020.
